nodes.text: The Pride of Corellia was a Galactic Alliance YZ-2500 heavy transport/capital ship serving in 130 ABY.

The Pride of Corellia was the flagship of Admiral Nict during the Sith–Imperial War. It was present at the Battle of Caamas, and was among the ships that answered to the calling of Admiral Gar Stazi, thus refusing to surrender to the Empire's forces under the command of Grand Admiral Morlish Veed. It was destroyed while the fleet was preparing for jump to hyperspace.
